What is the outlook for Cerebral Arteriosclerosis ?,Cerebral arteriosclerosis can lead to life threatening health events such as ischemic or hemorrhagic strokes. People who survive stroke may have long-term neurological and motor impairments.,NINDS,Cerebral Arteriosclerosis
